<js>
str1=java.ajax("https://m.douban.com/tag/小说/doulist");
str2=java.ajax("https://m.douban.com/tag/文学/doulist");
str3=java.ajax("https://m.douban.com/tag/历史/doulist");
str=String(str1+str2+str3);
reg1=/\d+(?=\?from_id)/gi;reg2=/[^>]+(?=<\/h3>)/gi;
id=str.match(reg1);name=str.match(reg2);x="";
for (i=0;i<id.length;i++){
name [i]=name[i].replace(/[^\-\s\d\w\u4e00-\u9fa5]/gi,"");
x+=name[i]+"::/doulist/"+id[i]+"?start={{(searchPage-1)*25}}&&"
}
result=x;
</js>

<js>
//注：自定义 d 的值：1是“简单”发现；2是“详细”发现。修改后，刷新发现缓存生效。
d = 1 ;
www="https://wap.faloo.com/category.aspx";
u1="::"; u2="&&";
importClass (org.jsoup.Jsoup);
function get (x,y){
list=Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(x)).select(y).toArray().map(a=>a.text()+u1+a.attr("href")).join(u2);return list};
switch (d){
case 1: css="div.dh+div.cat_box a[href~=\.html]";
result=get(www,css).replace(/(\/[01]){4}/g,"/0/0").replace(/\/(\d+)\/(\d)/g,"/$1/0/$2/searchPage");break;
case 2: css="div.cat_box+div.cat_box ul.cat_list a";
result=get(www,css).replace(/(?=\.html)/g,"/searchPage");break;}
</js>
